## LinkedList.get() method

Returns a specified element from a linked list.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
get(element: T): T | undefined;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  element | T | The element to return from the linked list. |

<b>Returns:</b>

T \| undefined
